name: Energy and Environmental Management
description: Research focused on energy management, environmental sustainability, and the integration of renewable energy sources.

name: Construction and Structural Engineering
description: Research on construction practices, materials, and structural performance under various conditions.

name: Advanced Materials and Nanotechnology
description: Research on the development and application of advanced materials, particularly in energy storage and biomedical fields.

name: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning in Engineering
description: Research on the application of AI and machine learning techniques in various engineering fields.

name: Seismic and Structural Analysis
description: Research on the analysis and design of structures under seismic loads and other environmental factors.

name: Water Resource Management
description: Research on the management and conservation of water resources, particularly in arid regions.

name: Control Systems and Robotics
description: Research on the development and optimization of control systems for robotic applications.
